About Stump Masters Jax

Affordable Stump Removal Jacksonville FL - Veteran Owned

Stump Masters Jax is Jacksonville's premier stump grinding and tree stump removal specialist, proudly serving Duval County, St. Johns County, and Clay County. As a veteran-owned and operated business, we bring military precision and dedication to every stump removal project.

We provide professional quotes for both residential and commercial stump grinding projects of all sizes throughout Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra, and Orange Park. Whether you're a homeowner looking to clear your yard or a business managing property maintenance, we have the expertise and equipment to handle your tree stump removal needs.

We are fully licensed and insured, providing you with peace of mind while we handle your stump grinding and removal needs. Our team uses state-of-the-art equipment and years of experience to deliver exceptional results with competitive, affordable pricing.

Whether you need stump grinding, complete tree stump removal, tree trimming (up to 15ft), or tree debris haul away services, we offer free same-day estimates over the phone. Same-day service, next-day service, and weekend scheduling available! Contact us today to reclaim your yard space!

Military & Veteran Discount: As a veteran-owned business, we're proud to offer 10% off the quoted price for all active military members and veterans. Thank you for your service!
